IN.IC: je pri zadnji zvezi oblika za tretjo osebo ednine sedanjega časa.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
one's feet
označujemo spodnji del noge; na njem stojimo.

The foot of something
je spodnji del nečesa.

seg.quote: He sat at the foot of her bed.

sense.def:
A foot
je dolžinska enota. Meri 12 palcev ali približno 30,48 centimetrov. Množina je
foot
ali
feet
.

seg.quote: We were a few feet away from the edge.

sense.def:
Kdor gre nekam
on foot
, tja hodi in ne uporablja kakega prevoznega sredstva.

seg.quote: The city should be explored on foot.

sense.def:
To be on one's feet
pomeni stati pokonci.

To be on one's s feet again
pomeni okrevati po bolezni ali težavnem obdobju.

seg.quote: ...an economic programme to put the country back on its feet.

sense.def:
To get to one's feet
pomeni stopiti na noge.

seg.quote: He rose hurriedly to his feet.

sense.def:
To set foot in a place
pomeni nekam iti.

seg.quote: It was a long time before I set foot in a theatre again.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo, ki ima oblast,
puts his foot down
, izjavi, da se nekaj ne sme zgoditi ali nadaljevati.

To put one's foot in it
pomeni povzročiti zadrego s tem, da storimo ali rečemo nekaj brezobzirnega;

Kadar mora nekdo
stand on his own two feet
, se mora znajti brez pomoči drugih.

cit.quote: postaviti se na svoje noge, postati samostojen

sense.def:
To foot the bill for something
pomeni nekaj plačati.

seg.quote: They may no longer be willing to foot the bills.
